biotools.summary: CANDOCK (Chemical Atomic Network-Based Hierarchical Flexible Docking Algorithm Using Generalized Statistical Potentials) is a novel docking algorithm, that utilizes a hierarchical approach to reconstruct ligands from an atomic grid using graph theory and generalized statistical potential functions to sample biologically relevant ligand conformations. Our algorithm accounts for protein flexibility, solvent, metal ions, and cofactor interactions in the binding pocket that are traditionally ignored by current methods.

bioschemas.name: CANDOCK
